alert.note: Alert for Kahoolawe in Maui (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 09 at 4:08PM HST until September 09 at 5:15PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM HST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE ISLAND OF MAUI IN MAUI COUNTY... At 408 PM HST, radar indicated rainfall diminishing in coverage and intensity over west Maui. However, flooding from earlier rainfall continues. Maui Emergency Management Agency reports road closures in South Kihei. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Flooding in drainages, streams, rivers, roads, properties, and other low-lying areas. Public road closures possible in some areas. Landslides are possible in steep terrain. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Kihei, Wailea, Ulupalakua, Makena and Keokea. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, rivers, drainage ditches, and culverts, even if they are currently dry. Do not cross fast flowing or rising water in your vehicle, or on foot. Turn around, don`t drown.
